org.apache.camel.model.language

Class ExpressionDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.camel.model.language.ExpressionDefinition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Expression, OtherAttributesAware, Predicate
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConstantExpression, ELExpression, ExchangePropertyExpression, ExpressionClause, GroovyExpression, HeaderExpression, JavaScriptExpression, JsonPathExpression, JXPathExpression, LanguageExpression, MethodCallExpression, MvelExpression, NamespaceAwareExpression, OgnlExpression, PhpExpression, PythonExpression, RefExpression, RubyExpression, SimpleExpression, SpELExpression, SqlExpression, TerserExpression, TokenizerExpression

    @Metadata(label="language",
          title="Expression")
public class ExpressionDefinition
extends Object
implements Expression, Predicate, OtherAttributesAware
    A useful base class for an expression
